## Options.statement\_schema property

The Joi schema used to validate each log statement. This option has effect only when `should_validate_log_statements` is set to `true`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
statement_schema?: Joi.ObjectSchema<Statement>;
```
